extendedInfo.description: **GAME ALERT** Play Bejeweled Blitz. Treat yourself to an exciting take on the world's #1 puzzle game from PopCap! New players Get 100,000 Coins Free. http://smarturl.it/blitzJoin millions of POGO players and enjoy FREE puzzle, word, and card games like Poppit!â¢, Word Whompâ¢, Turbo21â¢, and Sweet Tooth 2â¢. Premium Players and Club Pogo Members can also unlock a BONUS game â World Class Solitaire.EARN TOKENS, RANKS, AND MORE! See your Token totals grow and Ranks soar as you play. Club POGO members can also take on WEEKLY BADGE CHALLENGES and collect them all!LOOK AT ALL THE POPULAR GAMES YOU GET!For hours of casual fun on your Android device, enjoy these great Pogo Games for FREEâ¦ â¢ POPPIT! â Pop âtil you drop! Release hidden âprizesâ by popping groups of two or more balloons of the same color. â¢ WORD WHOMP â Show the gophers whoâs the real wordsmith and spell as many words as you can before the clock runs out. â¢ TURBO 21 â Enjoy this fast-paced, black-jack inspired card game that puts you in the driver's seat. â¢ SWEET TOOTH 2 â Match three or more sweets in a row to score!Premium Players and Club Pogo Members can also unlock the BONUS game â World Class Solitaire. You get more than just a soft drink and a bag of nuts with this travel inspired Solitaire. Itâs perfect for mobile play!*Having trouble with your Premium Upgrade purchase?  Go to âAbout & Settingsâ, tap the âUpgrade. Unlock. Enjoy!â section and tap on the âUpdate Membershipâ button to restore your purchase. ARE YOU A CLUB POGO MEMBER?Your Club Pogo membership gives you 100% Ad-Free gameplay, access to premium games like World Class Solitaire and exclusive Weekly Badge Challenges, just like on Pogo.com and Facebook!Be the first to know! Get inside EA info on great deals, plus the latest game updates, tips & moreâ¦VISIT US: eamobile.com/androidFOLLOW US: twitter.com/eamobileLIKE US: facebook.com/eamobileWATCH US: youtube.com/eamobilegamesCheck out more exciting games from EA like The Sims FreePlay, Need for Speed Most Wanted, Theme Park, World Series of Poker, and FIFA 12!For more information about the third party targeted ad serving and analytics technology in this app and data they collect, see End User License Agreement:http://tos.ea.com/legalapp/mobileeula/US/en/GM/

reviews.title: Where\'s the Android love?
reviews.comment: Love the app...wish Android wasn\'t always the least loved step child though and the last to get new things.  We need more games!
reviews.author: Jill Howland

reviews.title: Keeps freezing!
reviews.comment: Just installed on my GS3 to play Word Whomp and every second or third game, it freezes after I get a couple letters in and I have to back out and restart. Frustrating. If it continues, I\'ll have to uninstall. ... Poppit freezes on the third game. ... Really disappointed in EA here!
reviews.author: Chris Malles

reviews.title: Works on Toshiba tablet, won\'t install on GS4
reviews.comment: I originally installed this app back in Sept 2012 and it would just \"freeze\" at the EA splash screen, so I uninstalled it. I decided to give it another chance and now it\'s working great on my Toshiba Excite 10 (AT300). Unfortunately, it won\'t install to my GS4. At least now I can play my favorite Pogo game (World Class Solitaire) on my tablet! =:^)
reviews.author: Allen Borovkoff

reviews.title: Add issues
reviews.comment: For the last 2 days I have had issues with the adds not running or even showing so I can\'t close them to continue playing. Today when I open my app I get a black screen with \"add by\" and the name of some company in the bottom right corner. I can\'t even back out of the app. Just thought you should know.
reviews.author: Deanna Lenz

reviews.title: Fix this!
reviews.comment: I\'m tired of not being able to play solitare.. I\'ve deleted and redownloaded for it to work once or twice, then it just freezes on the screen where you click the star to play. This is the only game I play on this app and its useless.
reviews.author: Kristina Meche

reviews.title: Needs more games!!!!!
reviews.comment: I love pogo games!!!! I can\'t play all the games I would normally play on this app..... Why link it to my account if I can\'t play my favs!!!!!
reviews.author: Sharon d. Scott

reviews.title: UNINSTALLING
reviews.comment: This is the third week in a row that Pogo\'s challenge failed to record game progress. UNINSTALLING!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Keeps Freezing
reviews.comment: Nexus 7... Keeps locking up after playing one game. For how much $$ Pogo makes I expected a better App
reviews.author: Rhonda Heys

reviews.title: wish it had more
reviews.comment: a few games that get old real fast. needs to have more games. .... needs some of the real pogo site available to play.
reviews.author: j schmidt

reviews.title: Works Great
reviews.comment: Downloaded app and have had no problems with it.  Works exactly as it should.  Able to log in without a problem.  Agree with another user.  Would rate a 5 Star if had a couple more popular games.  Otherwise I would recommend!
reviews.author: Matt Helke

reviews.title: Ad freezes
reviews.comment: Every time I finish a game the screen gets stuck on the ad so I have to close the app and restart it...never happened before until a couple days ago
reviews.author: Kyle Dawson

reviews.title: Need More Android Games
reviews.comment: Love pogo but need more games. If we\'d be able 2  just play the games from online instead. I would use the app a lot more and would have given a better rating.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great way to psss time.
reviews.comment: I am NOT sure why people say you can\'t log onto their accounts because im logged on and my token count is exactly right.      Read about the app. Before you buy it. Great job developers
reviews.author: Eric Sudeth

reviews.title: Games and badges rarely work
reviews.comment: Badges seem to never recognize completion. I have two games that have frozen and I can\'t reset by logging out, or restating the application. When I report a problem I get an auto response telling me to look at the FAQ\'s or contact customer support. (Meaning they didn\'t look into the issue and wouldn\'t unless I complain again.)
reviews.author: Lauren LeRoux

reviews.title: Needs more games.
reviews.comment: but glad to see it on Android OS finally! Would like to see Mahjong Safari, Mahjong Garden & Tri Peaks added. Once more games are added then will up to 5 star rating... PLEASE BRING IT TO THE SAMSUNG GALAXY S4!!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Popp it is stuck
reviews.comment: Popp it keeps returning to a game that\'s ended and the menu button wont work... still!!!!! How long before its fixed people!!! If i could rate 0 stars i would!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Says failed!
reviews.comment: Wont let me sign into anything not my pogo account or Facebook i have installed and uninstalled many times! Needs fixed!!!!
reviews.author: Megan Tyree

reviews.title: Good but need more games
reviews.comment: I\'ve been a club member of Pogo off and on for quite a few years and love the variety and quality of Pogo\'s games. The quality is on this app too but it has a long way to go variety wise.
reviews.author: Karyl Anne

reviews.title: Not connected to internet
reviews.comment: Even though I\'m on the internet, I can\'t play solitaire because the app thinks I\'m not connected. This is frustrating! I pay for my subscription. Been a paying member for 8 years now. This just isn\'t right.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ad issues
reviews.comment: Keeps freezing on the ad screen. When I touch Menu or Skip, the ad just sits there and never clears. If I want to continue to play I have to return to the home screen and start the app again, which isn\'t worth it. Uninstalled, hopefully Greystripe ads and Pogo can resolve this someday.
reviews.author: Marissa Stewart
